07 Dec 2022: Water - 42.8F / 6.0C; Air - 41.0F / 5.0C. Take care folks, here it comes, you know what not to do.
06 Dec 2022: Water - 43.7F / 6.5C; Air - 41.0F / 5.0C. Blue sky thinking hello swimmers, enjoy the last day of summer.

04 Dec 2022: Water - 45.1F / 7.3C; Air - 41.0F / 5.0C. Guest temperature from Chalkwell beach, Essex. So this is the point at which the sea and the Serp are the same.
03 Dec 2022: Water - 45.3F / 7.4C; Air - 41.0F / 5.0C. The Winter Series is joyful and fulfilling. If it's pain and desolation you want, go to Winter Wonderland.

30 Nov 2022: Water - 50.7F / 10.4C; Air - 46.4F / 8.0C. Guest temperature from the river at Chiswick. If @thameswater pumped tons of raw sewage into the Serp we'd be that warm too.

29 Nov 2022: Water - 46.4F / 8.0C; Air - 46.4F / 8.0C. Guessing the temperature but it's bloody chilly. Parliament Hill Lido has lifeguards. We don't. Please underdo it.
https://t.co/84rjkR1bfe
28 Nov 2022: Water - 47.1F / 8.4C; Air - 46.4F / 8.0C. Aussie ice miler Nick swam past the red faced pommes, aussi Rory's apples were artfully displayed, says Anne.
27 Nov 2022: Water - 46.4F / 8.0C; Air - 53.6F / 12.0C. A damp, drizzly November in my soul... high time to get to sea as soon as I can.
26 Nov 2022: Water - 45.9F / 7.7C; Air - 46.4F / 8.0C. Guest temperature from Frensham Great Pond. It's all right but it's not as great as our pond.
25 Nov 2022: Water - 45.5F / 7.5C; Air - 46.4F / 8.0C. Digital said 8, mercury said 7, let's split the difference. We don't buy Black Friday, the sun shone in a clear blue sky.
24 Nov 2022: Water - 46.4F / 8.0C; Air - 44.6F / 7.0C. Ours friends from Biarritz dipped as did the temperature sorting the huit from the chauffe.
23 Nov 2022: Water - 48.2F / 9.0C; Air - 42.8F / 6.0C. King Charles III has already had the longest rain of any British monarch.
22 Nov 2022: Water - 48.2F / 9.0C; Air - 41.0F / 5.0C. Number 9, number 9, number 9...
21 Nov 2022: Water - 48.9F / 9.4C; Air - 42.8F / 6.0C. Up Rory us changing room scenes as his fruity offerings appeal to the core WhatsApple group. Pip pip!

20 Nov 2022: Water - 49.5F / 9.7C; Air - 48.2F / 9.0C. One of the greatest events in world sport is back, a festival of skill and friendship with competitors of many nations. We came a close second to @slsclido, whom we thank for hosting and look forward to welcoming Serpside.
19 Nov 2022: Water - 50.2F / 10.1C; Air - 46.4F / 8.0C. The winter series is hotting up but the pond on the other hand...

18 Nov 2022: Water - 50.0F / 10.0C; Air - 44.6F / 7.0C. Serpentine members are not required to be extremely hardcore, swimming long hours at high intensity. The platform we dive off will last a lot longer than this one.
17 Nov 2022: Water - 51.8F / 11.0C; Air - 50.0F / 10.0C. Nasty morning. If you were brave enough to swim you probably don't mind what the temperature really was.
16 Nov 2022: Water - 52.7F / 11.5C; Air - 50.0F / 10.0C. Bird flu is a tragic thing. This morning saw a confused Canadian spinning slowly into terminal lethargy. There was also a sick goose.

15 Nov 2022: Water - 52.7F / 11.5C; Air - 51.8F / 11.0C. Another great day for @thameswater shareholders
https://t.co/gK4MEnR6gb
14 Nov 2022: Water - 53.1F / 11.7C; Air - 48.2F / 9.0C. If you didn’t make it this morning, sorry we mist you.
13 Nov 2022: Water - 53.6F / 12.0C; Air - 53.6F / 12.0C. It dozen’t feel like winter is coming.
12 Nov 2022: Water - 53.2F / 11.8C; Air - 51.8F / 11.0C. Winter series well under way, it’ll all be over by Christmas.
11 Nov 2022: Water - 52.7F / 11.5C; Air - 53.6F / 12.0C. We remember the Serpentine fallen. They sleep beyond England's foam.
10 Nov 2022: Water - 51.8F / 11.0C; Air - 53.6F / 12.0C. Swimming suspended after 9.30 today in solidarity with the striking workers.
09 Nov 2022: Water - 53.6F / 12.0C; Air - 51.8F / 11.0C. New digital thermometer ordered so estimated temps will be more accurate.

08 Nov 2022: Water - 53.6F / 12.0C; Air - 55.4F / 13.0C. Full moon, and if you can't see it listen to our Stanley swimming it
https://t.co/YnvxFLAH1v
07 Nov 2022: Water - 53.6F / 12.0C; Air - 55.4F / 13.0C. The Toast twins warmed up the changing room though dropping your knickers in your tea is going a bit far.
06 Nov 2022: Water - 53.6F / 12.0C; Air - 55.4F / 13.0C. Splashing balls and spag bol, thanks to Robin for a night of polo and pasta mayhem.
05 Nov 2022: Water - 51.8F / 11.0C; Air - 46.4F / 8.0C. The winter series begins with some seriously wintry weather. The choir still sounded heavenly.
04 Nov 2022: Water - 53.6F / 12.0C; Air - 44.6F / 7.0C. Sadly a couple of swans succumbed to bird flu near the cafe. There is no danger to swimmers.

03 Nov 2022: Water - 55.4F / 13.0C; Air - 50.0F / 10.0C. Thames Toilets twice discharged sewage into the river last night at Isleworth and Hammersmith. You're better off in the duck poo. We'd all be better off if they cleaned up their act.
02 Nov 2022: Water - 56.3F / 13.5C; Air - 48.2F / 9.0C. Sleazy illicit Serpentine ice swimming MP in new publicity seeking challenge.
01 Nov 2022: Water - 55.4F / 13.0C; Air - 53.6F / 12.0C. The temperature book has been returned to the changing room with original artwork by Yvonne.
31 Oct 2022: Water - 56.3F / 13.5C; Air - 57.2F / 14.0C. Watery Witches Sabbath on a Monday morning. Happy Halloween!
30 Oct 2022: Water - 57.2F / 14.0C; Air - 59.0F / 15.0C. The temperature was supposed to go back last night as well but the thermometer forgot.
29 Oct 2022: Water - 56.3F / 13.5C; Air - 57.2F / 14.0C. There were Bunny's prizes and funny stories, Lenton got the cup and Benton brought cake.
28 Oct 2022: Water - 57.2F / 14.0C; Air - 60.8F / 16.0C. We swam noisily and celebrated Softley.
27 Oct 2022: Water - 55.8F / 13.2C; Air - 59.0F / 15.0C. Time stands still at the Serpentine. Particularly at 9.30am it seems.
26 Oct 2022: Water - 55.4F / 13.0C; Air - 53.6F / 12.0C. If you don't take the temperature, does it stay the same?

25 Oct 2022: Water - 55.4F / 13.0C; Air - 53.6F / 12.0C. The temperature is the same today as it was on this day last year. And the year before that. In a world of change we offer refreshing stability.

24 Oct 2022: Water - 56.7F / 13.7C; Air - 53.6F / 12.0C. In the past few days I have been overwhelmed by the number of people who suggested that I should once again contest the Serpentine Christmas race.
23 Oct 2022: Water - 55.4F / 13.0C; Air - 55.4F / 13.0C. Rainday but everyone who made it in was glad they did.
22 Oct 2022: Water - 56.3F / 13.5C; Air - 55.4F / 13.0C. The Hunte is over, the Emmiable Brian won the cup for the second time.
21 Oct 2022: Water - 54.9F / 12.7C; Air - 55.4F / 13.0C. It's not just the pound. Serp temperature dropped 6.8 degrees during the Truss premiership.
20 Oct 2022: Water - 53.6F / 12.0C; Air - 53.6F / 12.0C. Joyeux Anniversaire a la club secretaire, her reigning swim today was a douzey!
19 Oct 2022: Water - 54.0F / 12.2C; Air - 55.4F / 13.0C. Change of poetic direction: O wild East Wind, thou breath of Autumn's being.
18 Oct 2022: Water - 53.8F / 12.1C; Air - 44.6F / 7.0C. On a sunny day in autumn the pond is a prism refracting every colour in the spectrum into the surrounding sky and landscape.
17 Oct 2022: Water - 54.9F / 12.7C; Air - 59.0F / 15.0C. Pond topped up overnight and heating turned on.

15 Oct 2022: Water - 54.5F / 12.5C; Air - 51.8F / 11.0C. The club secretary took minutes off her rivals to keep up with the Joneses and win the cup.
14 Oct 2022: Water - 55.4F / 13.0C; Air - 51.8F / 11.0C. 13 on Friday. Lucky for some.
13 Oct 2022: Water - 55.0F / 12.8C; Air - 53.6F / 12.0C. When it rains, it rains chestnuts too, get em quick before the squirrels and the geese.

https://t.co/jjxllhmryG

peanuts.
08 Oct 2022: Water - 56.7F / 13.7C; Air - 48.2F / 9.0C. Trent victorious in the Long run, Serps glorious in the warm sun.
08 Oct 2022: Water - 89.1F / 31.7C; Air - 48.2F / 9.0C. Trent victorious in the Long run, Serps glorious in the warm sun.

06 Oct 2022: Water - 56.5F / 13.6C; Air - 48.2F / 9.0C. The sunnier it is, the colder it gets, the better it feels.

09 Sep 2022: Water - 66.2F / 19.0C; Air - 62.6F / 17.0C. Bless you Ma'am, a mourning swim with immense gratitude to our proprietor and protector.
We join those around the world in sending their condolences to the Royal Family and in expressing their profound gratitude to Her Majesty, The Queen, for her life of service. https://t.co/jweCwfmHB1

31 Jul 2022: Water - 69.8F / 21.0C; Air - 64.4F / 18.0C. Ne ne and twice ne, thanks Jeremy and Ingrid for the Serps favourite summer awayday!
30 Jul 2022: Water - 69.8F / 21.0C; Air - 66.2F / 19.0C. Lucky strikes twice Baxter back as Linda cops the cup followed by past winner hubby John.
29 Jul 2022: Water - 69.1F / 20.6C; Air - 68.0F / 20.0C. New shower working well so you can wash after your bath.
28 Jul 2022: Water - 68.0F / 20.0C; Air - 68.0F / 20.0C. Twenty Twenty today and surely the Serpentine is the finest sight in London.

27 Jul 2022: Water - 71.6F / 22.0C; Air - 62.6F / 17.0C. Didn't go so guesstimate. Striking for better temperatures, longer swimming hours and more cake. And improved pay and conditions for our essential services because they deserve them.

25 Jul 2022: Water - 72.7F / 22.6C; Air - 68.0F / 20.0C. The water wasn't clear, the beach wasn't sandy and the sun didn't Burnett, but super stylish husband and wife wardening.
24 Jul 2022: Water - 73.2F / 22.9C; Air - 73.4F / 23.0C. Tri swimmers in wetsuits and try swimmers without - Mike Harris has the best one liner since your negative covid test.
23 Jul 2022: Water - 72.5F / 22.5C; Air - 68.0F / 20.0C. By George! @ozzbattlers for the podium but Nick hungered for victory and Rose to the occasion to retain the cup with a bagpipe fanfare.

In 2021; the club raised USD $20;000 for one-to-one swimming lessons for children with physical and sensory disabilities via @LevelWaterSwim.

We wish everybody happy swimming and good luck in your swimming adventures.

Happy Saturday 🎉

Serpentine members have a long history of supporting and giving back to the swimming community. 

They have held officer and committee positions in IMSHOF and in IMSHOF Honor Organizations: British Long Distance Swimming Association; the @CSAswimmers and the @csandpf.

Alison Streeter, MBE (43 crossings; Jon Erikson (11 crossings), Kevin Murphy (34 solos). 

Additional marathons completed by members include: Straits of Gibraltar; Lake Geneva/ Lac Leman; Lake Zurich; Capri-Napoli; Lake Annecy; Round Jersey; Jersey to France; Round Guernsey;

The club has a historic focus on swimming the English Channel (between 1957 and 2021, 82 members have completed solos). The first female and male swimmers to complete English Channel triples, were club members and IMSHOF Honorees:

The Serpentine Swimming Club is proud to be inducted today as an honouree of the International Marathon Swimming Hall of Fame (IMSHOF). 

Based in Hyde Park, London, the club was founded in 1864 and is a haven for cold water enthusiasts, and a major hub for marathon swimmers. https://t.co/ESdnBuqsAk
